doc:
Bobby Connelly https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bobby_Connelly 0 Robert Joseph "Bobby" Connelly (April 4, 1909 – July 5, 1922) was an American child actor of silent films. He is one of the first male child stars of American motion pictures beginning his career in 1913 at the age of four. Robert_Joseph_"_Bobby_"_Connelly ( April_4_,_1909 – July_5_,_1922 ) was an_American_child_actor of silent_films . He is one of the_first_male_child_stars of American_motion_pictures beginning his_career in 1913 at the_age of four .
